title: A straunge and wonderfull example of the iudgement of almighty God shewed vpon two adulterous persons in London, in the parish of S. Brydes, in Fleetestreete, this thurde of Februarie. 1583. Set forth for a memorable example before our eyes, both to make vs remember the frailty of this life, and to call vs vnto repentance. By Samuel Saxey, student in diuinitie.
author: Saxey, Samuel.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Fleetestreate, beneath the Conduite, at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist, by [H. Bynneman? for] H. Iackson,
